name: Jalpi By Konceptwise Digital Media Private Limited
description:
Jalpi offers a seamless integration of WhatsApp Business API to enhance customer engagement. With Jalpi services and competitive pricing, you can streamline your communication and drive business growth. 

With Jalpi, companies can automate sending personalized notifications to their customers, making communication quick and hassle-free.

Our Team Inbox feature helps businesses manage their WhatsApp communications seamlessly. It includes smart routing, automated responses, data tagging, and analytics to streamline customer support.

we offer no or low-code workflow builders and chatbots, allowing businesses to automate many interactions. 

We extend our expertise to service providers, media agencies, resellers, and technology enablers, delivering tailored solutions built on the WhatsApp Business API.
focus_areas: Whatsapp Engagement Platform : Helping Businesses with WhatsApp Broadcasting Automation, Live Chat & Chatbots
WhatsApp Cloud API for technology enablers
WhatsApp Partner Solutions for marketplaces, CRMs, ERPs and technology enablers
